page.title: 11CHANGES ON DUNECHT ESTATE
page.content: {Lord Cowdray}has been involved with the management of Dunecht Estate since 1931 and there have been many changes during that time. In 1931 very few of the houses had bathrooms or running water,and all the Estate houses now have bathrooms.Water now comes to houses and farms in main pipes where formally it came from wells and ditches. {Farms and houses}where they had electricity,had their own generators, but now they have mains electricity from the Hydro Electricity Board. Fifty years ago many of the farms on the Estate had dairy cows,but now there are very few and these farms produce beef and sheep. Many of the farms were originally quite small,but as the tenants have retired,the land has been added to adjoining areas to form larger farms.
